title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: When modifying the default value of a list box in a report parameter, the previously set default value is lost. This issue results in the default value not being retained correctly.
OB: The default value is not set in the list box of the report parameter when modified.
EB: The default value should be retained and displayed correctly after modifying it in the list box of the report parameter. Specifically, the default value 'aaa' should be visible.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Navigate to the list box for the report parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Save and apply the changes.
5. Verify that the default value 'aaa' is correctly displayed in the list box.
6. Confirm that the OK button is disabled and cannot be used after step 5.
